meanings.definition: A set of eight offspring born at one birth.
meanings.sent1: The zoo welcomed a rare group of octuplets born to the panda.
meanings.sent2: The octuplets were all born healthy and strong.
meanings.sent3: The octuplets decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with octuplets of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The octuplets' birthday party was a joyful celebration with cake and balloons.

meanings.definition: A group of eight siblings born at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The octuplets played together in the backyard every afternoon.
meanings.sent2: The family was surprised by the arrival of octuplets, but they welcomed them with open arms.
meanings.sent3: The octuplets all wanted to sit in the front row at the movie theater.
meanings.sent4: The octuplets' laughter filled the house with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The octuplets' bond was unbreakable, supporting each other through thick and thin.
